name: TapTap Beat
description:
Play rhythm game with popular songs. Tap your fingers following the beat.

A selection of popular YouTube music library entering the rhythm game, brings immersive music experience.

The best soundtrack design of popular songs let your fingertips dance.

The main features of TapTap Beat:
1 Challenge mode
Follow our carefully arranged list of the hottest pop songs, play while listening music, and gradually improve your skills

2 Free selection of Music
Find your favorite song and play a game anytime. Relax yourself or challenge your limit!

3 Continuously updated music library
The latest and hottest music will be constantly updated, please come to check at any time. Here you can find various styles of popular music, DJ / Remix, classical music, etc.


How to play
Start a piece of music through the challenge mode or free selection mode

The melody in the song will become one-touch notes, long-key notes, falling from the top of the screen. When the notes reach the bottom key area of the screen, touch the corresponding position; when the sound line reaches the corresponding position, finger hold the note area and slide with the line until the line disappears

When you strike a note, according to the accuracy of the timing, it will be scored and judged to be Perfect, Great, or Miss.

When you continuously hit notes, a combo will be generated, higher combo will bring higher score.

At the end of the song, a rating will be given based on your score, you can always challenge the same song repeatedly in the free selection mode to obtain a higher rating
